Description: Four men were wounded at a strip mall following a dispute over a work ticket in the southeast side.[16]
Ten people were injured in a drive-by shooting during an ongoing parade in the St. Roch neighborhood.[17]
Four people were injured in an early morning shooting near the Hungarian Village neighborhood in the south side.[18]
A woman was killed and four others were injured when a shooting at a large gathering broke out.[19]
Four people were shot and two others were stabbed during a street party in the La Sierra neighborhood.[20]
Emergency crews responding to a house fire found four people, including a teenager, shot, three fatally.[21]
During an ongoing illegal party being held at an abandoned house, a shooting that broke out killed a 12-year-old boy and injured four other men.[22][23]

A man shot and killed his ex-girlfriend and her husband inside a car in the Little Italy neighborhood of Downtown San Diego when they arrived near the courthouse to attend the restraining order hearing during the morning hours. Minutes later, he shot at the police after they located him, wounding one officer. The shooter was then killed when police fired back.[24]

A man who was pointing a gun at people at a gas station in the northeast side opened fire at the police after being asked to drop the weapon. Officers then returned fire and killed the suspect. Three others were injured in the shootout.[25]
Five men were found dead from gunshot wounds at three different homes. Police later learned that a man killed his father, his stepfather, and his two neighbors before taking his own life.[26]
A dispute over a firearm escalated into a shooting that injured four on the southeast side.[27]

Tuskegee University shooting: During the 100th homecoming week celebration at Tuskegee University, a man opened fire on campus, killing an unaffiliated teen and wounding at least twelve others, including students. Four others suffered non-gunfire-related injuries.[28]
Five people were injured when a man opened fire at a party center after being denied entry.[29]
Four people, one fatally, were injured when an altercation between the two groups escalated into a shooting at a restaurant on the west side.[30]
Two people were killed and two others were injured when gunfire broke out near the University of Louisiana campus during a homecoming game.[31]
A shooting on the patio of a restaurant in the Sandusky neighborhood wounded five.[32]

A man entered the apartment of a woman who had a restraining order against him and opened fire, striking four family members of the woman, one of whom died. The man then kidnapped the woman and responding officers engaged in a high-speed pursuit with him into Dauphin County where he was stopped with a PIT maneuver by Pennsylvania State Police on Route 147. After being stopped, the man opened fire on police who returned fire and fatally shot him. The kidnapped woman was found dead inside the man's car, but it is unclear who shot her.[33]

A man went to his ex-partner's home in the Cody neighborhood and fatally shot her and their son. The man then returned to his home in the Denfield neighborhood and fatally shot his wife and their son before committing suicide.[34]

Three people were shot on the porch of a home in the Northview Heights neighborhood in the North Side. A fourth victim, a man, was found inside a vehicle by responding officers suffering a gunshot wound after he crashed in East Allegheny.[35]
A shooting that disrupted a homecoming party injured four.[36]

Authorities began receiving calls about a shooting at a house party shortly after midnight and responding officers found a man suffering a mortal gunshot wound on the ground outside a car crashed in a ditch near the party. Later, three other men arrived at hospitals with gunshot wounds.[37]
Two people were killed and four others were injured in the Claytown neighborhood in the city's west side.[38]
Two people were killed and two others were injured in an early morning shooting north of Elkton.[39]
One person was killed and three others were injured outside of a tavern in Midtown Reno.[40]
Three people were killed and three others were injured when a shooting broke out during a Halloween house party.[41]
Four people, including two teenagers, were injured in a shooting in Downtown New Haven in which counterfeit bills were found strewn around the scene of the attack.[42]

2024 Orlando Halloween shooting: Two men were killed and seven others were wounded when a suspect, a 17-year-old boy, opened fire in Downtown Orlando during Halloween festivities. One woman was hospitalized after she was trampled by people fleeing the shooting.[43]
A man was killed and three other men were injured in a shooting in northeastern Wilmington.[44]
Four people were injured after a fight between two neighbors escalated into a shooting north of Zephyrhills.[45]
Five men were injured when a man opened fire at an apartment complex in the southeast side.[46]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting during the evening.[47]
Six people were shot at a former laundromat being used to host a party after an argument broke out. One of the victims returned fire.[48]
A teenager was killed and five others were injured in a shooting at a Halloween house party.[49]
Two people were killed and two others were injured after a fight in a parking lot escalated into a shooting in the Southside neighborhood.[50]
A fight at a party escalated into a shooting that wounded five men, including two teenagers.[51]
Two teenagers were killed and three others were injured in an overnight shooting.[52]

A shooting which injured no one on the North Carolina Central University campus during a homecoming celebration led to a lockdown and a sweep of the campus by police officers. During the sweep, another shooting happened on campus, unrelated to the first shooting, in which four people, including one student, were injured.[53]
Six men were shot in the Mural District of Downtown Fresno.[54]
A man was killed and three others were injured when at least two people opened fire.[55]
A late night shooting injured four people in the Brook Oaks neighborhood.[56]
Five people, including two children, were injured in a shooting at an apartment complex in southeast Montgomery. One of the wounded died six days later.[57]

A 15-year-old boy fatally shot three of his siblings and his parents at their home west of Snoqualmie. One of his sisters survived by playing dead after being shot before escaping through a window.[58]
One person was killed and eight others were injured in a shooting at a party.[59]
A shooting in a parking lot of a nightclub hosting a concert killed a man and injured five others.[60]
Nine people, mostly teenagers, were injured when a teenager opened fire at a high school party after being refused entry. One of the injured returned fire, killing the shooter.[61]
A teenager was killed and four others, including a teenage girl, were injured in a shooting on the campus of Albany State University during a homecoming celebration.[62]

During a celebration at an outdoor trail north of Lexington following a high school football game, an argument between two young men escalated, killing three, including two teenagers, and injuring eight others.[63][64]

An argument at an 'Instagram' party escalated into a shooting that left seven people injured, including a teenage girl, near Fotterall Square in the Hartranft neighborhood in the city's north side.[65]
An argument among a group of men in the MorningSide neighborhood on the city's east side escalated into a shooting that killed one and injured three others.[66]
A teenager was killed and seven others, mostly other teenagers, were injured in a shooting at a nightclub near Elberton.[67]
One person was killed and four others were injured after an altercation at an unauthorized bar escalated.[68]
One person was killed and nine others were injured when two groups exchanged gunfire near Tennessee State University's homecoming game.[69]
An argument at a Halloween party that escalated into a shooting killed a person and wounded fourteen others in the city's southwest side.[70]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a private party.[71]
Four adult men and one teenage male were shot in the Westport area.[72]
A teenager was killed in a shooting in the North Side neighborhood while out celebrating his birthday. Four others were injured.[73]
An argument that escalated into a shooting injured four people in the Bricktown area of Downtown Oklahoma City.[74]
Two men were killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a shopping center overnight in the Westwood neighborhood.[75]
Four people, including a security guard, were injured when a fight escalated into a shooting at a nightclub in the Briarmeadow neighborhood.[76]
An apparent dispute over a choice in music led to an attempted robbery and a shooting that killed a man and injured three other men.[77]
A man was killed and three others were injured in an early morning shooting at a restaurant.[78]
A fight during a party at a venue escalated into a shooting when two people opened fire on each other, striking five.[79]
A man was killed and three others were injured in the Woodland neighborhood of Southeast DC.[80]
A dispute led to two teenagers opening fire outside an apartment complex, killing three people. One of the victims returned fire and wounded both suspects.[81]
A man opened fire with a rifle at a gathering at an apartment complex in the Mooretown neighborhood, wounding four, including a baby.[82]
Four people were shot, three fatally, over a dispute over who had the rights to hunt on a particular piece of land south of Woodruff.[83]
Multiple shooters from a vehicle opened fire at a group of men walking, wounding four near a music studio in the Irving Park neighborhood on the northwest side.[84]
Three people opened fire in the Vermont Knolls neighborhood of South Los Angeles, wounding six.[85]

During a prayer vigil at a home, a person pulled up in their vehicle in front of the residence and then opened fire, killing a man and injuring six others in the Little Village neighborhood on the city's west side.[86]

September 2024 Birmingham shooting: Four people were killed and seventeen others were wounded when multiple people drove up to a hookah bar and exited their vehicles to open fire on a line of queued people in what is suspected to be a murder-for-hire motivated attack.[87]
Six people were shot near the border of the Greenpoint and East Williamsburg neighborhoods in Brooklyn.[88]
Two men were killed and three others, including two teenage girls, were injured in a shooting following a fight in the Downtown West area.[89]
One person was killed and three others were injured in the Elmwood Park neighborhood on the southwest side.[90]
A teenage boy was killed and three others, including two other teenagers, were wounded in the area between the Garfield and Eastlake Park neighborhoods of Central Phoenix.[91]
Two people were killed and three injured in a series of shootings at homeless camps. A Native Mob member was arrested for the shootings.[92]
An exchange of fire between two people in the Academy neighborhood in North St. Louis killed three people and wounded one other person.[93]
Four people, including a 13-year-old girl, were wounded when shots were fired into a fitness studio in the Back of the Yards neighborhood on the city's south side.[94]
Four men were shot in a neighborhood north of Florissant.[95]

Several NYPD officers fired shots into a crowd at an allegedly knife-wielding fare evader at the Sutter Avenue station in Brooklyn, striking the suspect, one officer, and two bystanders.[96][97][98] Footage later revealed the fare evader was standing still with his arms by his side when police opened fire.[99]
Four people were wounded on the city's east side.[100]
Four men were shot at a gas station in the Portland neighborhood on the city's northeast side.[101]
A drive-by shooting during a block party in the Houston Gardens neighborhood on the city's northeast side killed three and injured eight during the early morning hours.[102]
A man shot three relatives, killing one, before taking his own life at the nail salon he owned.[103]
Three men were fatally shot at a home in the Colemont neighborhood. A bicyclist who was riding by at the time of the killings was shot in the hip by a stray bullet.[104]

A man arrived at a home in the Old Brooklyn neighborhood and began arguing with a woman who he fatally shot before injuring two others. The man then fled the scene and was chased by police before he committed suicide.[105]
Two men were killed and three others were injured at a business.[106]
A man killed his wife and two children before turning the gun on himself.[107]
An argument between two people at a fraternity center for Florida Memorial University escalated into a shooting that wounded five.[108]

A man returned to a bar after being asked to leave and opened fire before driving down the road and firing into several other homes and businesses before he was arrested. One woman was killed and four others were injured.[109]

Interstate 75 Kentucky shooting: A man opened fire on the northbound and southbound lanes of Interstate 75 near exit 49 northwest of London from a cliff ledge, striking twelve vehicles and wounding five people, before fleeing the scene and prompting a manhunt and causing multiple schools, businesses, and churches to close in the county and surrounding counties. Three others were injured as a result of vehicular accidents caused by the attack.[110][111] Police said they found the suspect dead close by on September 18.[112]
Five people were shot in the Washington Highlands neighborhood of Southeast DC.[113]
At least two people driving on Interstate 65 in Saraland opened fire on each other, resulting in three people being wounded in one vehicle and a fourth being injured in the other.[114]
Three police officers were shot and injured attempting trying to serve a warrant at an apartment building near Timmerman Airport. The suspect, who was also shot, was later arrested.[115]

2024 Apalachee High School shooting: A student opened fire at Apalachee High School, located southwest of Winder, killing two students and two teachers, and wounding six other students and another teacher. Two other students sustained non-gunshot injuries. The shooter surrendered immediately upon being confronted by responding police.[116][117] He was charged with four counts of felony murder. The father, who gave him the weapon, was charged with four counts of involuntary manslaughter, two counts of second degree murder, and eight counts of cruelty to children.[118]

A woman and her three children were found dead inside a vehicle after police responded to a report of a suspected homicide near the house. Officials later stated the woman had killed the three children and herself.[119]

A man stole a car from East Orange and then drove to the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Newark where he opened fire, striking four people. The stolen vehicle was later found on fire in the south part of the neighborhood.[120]
A shooting during a candlelight vigil for a fatal shooting that killed three men at a Citgo gas station injured four people.[121]
A man went on a shooting spree along Interstate 5 across King and Pierce counties, wounding five in six different shooting attacks in a two and a half hour timespan.[122]

One person was killed and three others were injured when someone broke down the door of the apartment they were playing cards in and opened fire in the Titusville neighborhood. The attack was believed to be robbery-motivated.[123]
During the annual West Indian Day Parade, a dispute escalated into a shooting that left five people wounded in the Crown Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn. One of the wounded later died.[124]
Five people were injured in a late night shooting at a nightclub in the Antioch neighborhood on the city's southeast side.[125]

2024 Chicago train shooting: Four people were fatally shot on a Blue Line train between Oak Park and Harlem stations in the Oak Park area. The suspect was later located and arrested at the California station on the Pink Line in Chicago. The attack caused the Blue Line to be shut down between the Forest Park and Austin stations.[126]
Five people were injured in a shooting in Downtown West. One woman suffered a gunshot wound while four others suffered wounds from bullet fragments.[127]
A mother and her three children were shot at their home. A baby survived with a severe gunshot wound to the face.[128]
Four people were shot in the east side during a dispute over stolen property.[129]
Police responding to reports of shots fired found four people suffering from gunshot wounds.[130]
Four people were injured in an early morning shooting.[131]
Following a fight at a bar, a group of five women were driving away when they were fired upon in Mid-City, causing a roll-over crash. One woman was killed and the four others were injured.[132]

A man rammed his tractor into several vehicles outside his neighbor's residence where a party was being held, then shot into the tractor's fuel drums and into the home's carport and at fleeing partygoers, killing three and injuring two others, before he was fatally shot by the homeowner.[133]

Four people at an apartment were drinking together throughout the day in the Near North Valley area. During the late evening an argument escalated into a shooting in which a man shot and killed the three he had been drinking with before fatally shooting himself.[134]
A teenager was killed and four other teenagers were injured in a shooting near the campus of Euclid High School following a high school football game.[135]
Five teenagers were shot in a sports park during the evening hours.[136]

A man sought out a police officer and fatally shot him as he sat in his patrol car in a parking lot in Cedar Crest (near Oak Cliff). Officers responded after hearing gunshots over the fallen officer's radio and were fired upon by the man, with two officers being struck by gunfire. The man then fled north along Interstate 35E before he was stopped by pursuing police officers 40 miles away in Lewisville where he was fatally shot after an exchange of gunfire.[137]
Four men were shot during the evening hours in a residential area.[138]
Three men and a woman were shot in the Kensington neighborhood on the northeast side.[139]
A drive-by shooting during a house party wounded a man and three women.[140]
A man was killed and three other men were injured in a shooting at Dunham Park.[141]
A man fired at another group during a Dominican Festival in Downtown Allentown, resulting in a shootout that injured eight people.[142]
One person was killed and five others were injured in a shooting south of Lubbock.[143]

A man fatally shot himself outside the home of his recently deceased mother after shooting and killing three of his siblings and a niece inside the home. They had gathered at the home for the funeral and planned to sell the estate.[144]
Six people were shot shortly after midnight in the Africatown neighborhood.[145]
One person was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at an intersection.[146]
A 16-year-old boy fatally shot four men at a sports park north of Dalton in what was believed to be a robbery-motivated attack.[147]
Three masked people fired into a home in the Eastwood neighborhood, striking three teenagers and a young child, before fleeing.[148]
A man was killed and three other men, including a security guard, were injured in an early morning shooting at a north side bar in the Washington Park neighborhood.[149]
Two people ran across a storefront area and opened fire, injuring four men in the process, in the Haverford North neighborhood on the west side.[150]
Six people, including a three-year-old girl, were shot in a drive-by shooting in the Belhaven neighborhood.[151]
Four people were shot overnight in the Westmont neighborhood.[152]
Two people opened fire in the Back of the Yards neighborhood on the south side, killing a man and injuring five other men, including a man who was driving by at the time of the attack.[153]
A man killed two people and wounded one other outside the Hardin County courthouse and later shot and wounded himself after a police chase. The suspect later died at a hospital.[154]
Four people were wounded when a person opened fire into a group of people in the Bricktown area of Downtown Oklahoma City. Two officers fired at the suspect before they eventually surrendered.[155]
A man was killed and seven others were injured in a shooting at a gathering in the Oliver neighborhood.[156]
Five people were shot at Franklin Park on the outskirts of the Dominican Festival.[157]

A group of five children stole a vehicle and were followed by another vehicle. After some time at least one occupant in the other vehicle opened fire in the Jordan neighborhood, striking four of the children. Two of the children had been arrested less than two weeks prior for stealing another vehicle.[158]
A crowded argument escalated into a shooting that killed two people and wounded two others in the city's east side.[159]
An early morning shooting at a bar in Downtown Jackson killed one and injured five others.[160]
A man shot four others outside a Midtown restaurant after arguing about a parking spot.[161]
One person was killed and three people were injured in a shooting at the Sandcreek Commons Condos.[162]
A man chased a woman into a neighbor's home as a result of a domestic incident and began firing into the home, striking three people inside, before he was fatally shot by responding police.[163]
Four people were injured in an on-campus shooting at Virginia State University. None of the victims or suspects are students of the school.[164]
A man killed one person and wounded two adolescents before taking his own life.[165]

A man opened fire on his ex-girlfriend, her sister and brother, and her friend after he broke into their apartment. The man wounded his ex-girlfriend and her siblings and fatally shot her friend when he attempted to disarm him in a struggle.[166]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a Near West Side club after an argument escalated.[167]
Four people were injured in a shooting.[168]
A man killed a woman and a six-year-old child while wounding two others before taking his own life in a domestic-related incident.[169]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a car meet at the Lee Harvard Shopping Center in the Leeâ€“Miles neighborhood.[170]
Six people were shot outside of a pop-up nightclub in the Brentwood neighborhood.[171]
A shooting at an event left five people wounded, including three teens, near a park on the city's southwest side in the Mechanicsville neighborhood.[172]
Four people were injured in a shooting at Far North Dallas.[173]
A shooting at a Shell gas station injured four people on the city's south side in the Montclaire South neighborhood.[174]
One person was killed and five others were injured in an overnight shooting.[175]
A man opened fire at two homes in the West End Manor neighborhood, killing two and injuring two others, in a domestic-related incident.[176]
Six men were injured near St. James Park when two other men pulled up on scooters and opened fire in the Fordham neighborhood of The Bronx.[177]
A fight at a house party at a home east of Berkeley Springs led to a shooting that wounded four.[178]
A drive-by shooting on the edge of Downtown Seattle in Capitol Hill injured four people. One of the victims crashed his vehicle into the Swedish First Hill hospital while fleeing the scene.[179]
A teenager killed another teenager and injured three other people after a dispute over a stolen cell phone east of Vicksburg.[180]
One person was killed and five others were injured after an argument escalated into a shootout at a gathering in the city's south side.[181]
A shooting during a sideshow injured five in the Dimond District neighborhood on the city's east side.[182]
Three women and a man were injured when four men opened fire on them outside a nightclub on the city's northeast side.[183]
Five men were shot in the Washington Park neighborhood in the city's south side. The five shooting victims were uncooperative with responding police.[184]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting outside a restaurant in Chinatown on the city's south side.[184]
Eight people were injured in an early morning shooting in the city's north side.[185]
Five people were injured in a shooting attack southeast of downtown Springfield. Multiple vehicles were shot during the attack.[186]
Two people were killed and two were injured in a shooting in the NoMa neighborhood of Northeast DC.[187]
Five people were shot outside of a bar in the city's north side in the Williamsburg neighborhood.[188]
One person was killed and three others were injured in the city's east side near the Charlotte Museum of History.[189]

A woman called law enforcement for a well-being check on a nearby home east of Umatilla and when officers arrived it appeared that a home had been burglarized, and they ordered people they heard inside to come out. When the officers made entry they were fired upon by the woman's husband and two daughters. All three attackers and one of the deputies were killed, while two other deputies sustained gunshot wounds. The woman who called 911 was later arrested and charged with premeditated murder.[190][191]
One person was killed and three others were injured in an afternoon shooting.[192]
A shooting at a Shell gas station left one dead and three others injured.[193]
Four people were shot, one fatally, in the parking lot of an auto repair shop in the North Deering neighborhood.[194]
A group of four masked men opened fire on another group exiting a bus at a bus stop, injuring four, in what is believed to be a targeted attack. One of the victims in the group returned fire.[195]
Four people were injured in the city's northeast side.[196]
A woman was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a restaurant in the Tower Grove East neighborhood on the city's south side.[197]
A drive-by shooting at a community center northwest of Brent where a basketball game was being held killed two people and injured five others.[198]
Four people, including a 14-year-old boy, were wounded in a drive-by shooting in the South Park neighborhood of South Los Angeles.[199]
Two people were killed and five others were injured in a shooting in Maplewood Park in the Maplewood Historic District.[200]
Five teenagers were shot in the city's northwest side.[201]
Three teenagers and a woman were shot in an apartment complex parking lot, with two of the teens being killed.[202]
Three shooters opened fire at a gas station, wounding five, in the city's south side.[203]
A fight at a birthday party among a group of adults and juveniles at Pioneer Park escalated into a shooting that wounded six.[204]

A Lafayette police SWAT team member was killed and three others were wounded in a shootout during a hostage situation, in which a man wanted for a drive-by shooting barricaded himself inside a home with two others, including a juvenile.[205]
Three people were injured when a man opened fire on a tree trimming crew. The suspect was shot by police before being taken into custody.[206]
Four people were shot inside a vehicle when they were fired upon by at least one other person inside another vehicle.[207]
A shooting in a Dineen Park parking lot left a teenage girl dead and eight others wounded.[208]
A shooting at a block party injured seven people, including two teenagers.[209]
A shooting at a Shell gas station killed two, including the owner, and injured four others.[210]
Three men, including two suspects, were killed and sixteen people wounded in a shooting near a club.[211][212]

An altercation at a block party escalated into a gunfight that killed three people and injured six others, including one of the shooters in the Carroll Park neighborhood of the city's west side.[213][214]
A shooting killed a young man and injured three others.[215]
A man killed his brother, grandfather and aunt before committing suicide.[216]
A man killed his wife and four children north of West Blocton.[217]
Three suspects opened fire with rifles in an intersection in the Shipley Terrace neighborhood of southeast DC, killing two men and injuring two others, including a two-year-old girl.[218]
Two suspects opened fire near a taco stand in the Westlake neighborhood, injuring one intended target and three others.[219]
Four people were injured in a shooting on the city's east side.[220]

One person was killed and five other people were injured in a shooting at an encampment in the Ventura Village neighborhood of Phillips on the city's south side. One man was arrested on obstruction charges and unrelated warrants.[221]

A male teenager opened fire on three women, including two other teenagers, as they attempted to enter a vehicle at an apartment complex. After killing one of the teenagers, the shooter then shot himself.[222]
Five people, including a boy, were injured in a shooting at a basketball court in the Carson Heights neighborhood on the city's south side.[223]
Officers responding to a home found three women shot to death in a car and a man dead on the driveway. Investigators later determined it was a murder-suicide.[224]
Four people were wounded when someone fired multiple shots into the group during a celebration in the Jeffery Manor neighborhood of the city's south side.[225]
Four people were shot in the Newhallville neighborhood on the city's north side.[226]
A drive-by shooting in the city's north side killed four people and injured ten others at a birthday party held by a social club.[227]

Attempted assassination of Donald Trump in Pennsylvania: A man opened fire on former President Donald Trump during a campaign rally being held at the Butler Farm Show fairground from atop a nearby roof, killing an audience member, grazing Trump on the ear, and critically injuring two other audience members.[228] The man was then killed by a Secret Service sniper.[229] A Butler Township officer who attempted to climb onto the roof to confront the shooter severely injured his ankle when he fell off the roof when the man pointed his rifle at him just before opening fire on the rally.[230]
Three women and two men were shot in the Russell neighborhood.[231]
Four people were found shot, one fatally, in the city's southwest side. One of the victims critically wounded in the same shooting was also found in the South Seneca neighborhood.[232]
A drive-by shooting in the North Lawndale neighborhood on the city's west side left five people wounded.[233]
Two males opened fire on a group of teenagers, wounding all four, in the Murdock neighborhood.[234]
A man fatally shot his wife, her parents, and two of his sons at their home before being arrested.[235]
Five people, including an 11-year-old, were shot while celebrating at a gathering in the Dorchester neighborhood.[236]
A drug deal gone wrong resulted in a shooting that killed one and injured three in the Westover Hills neighborhood in the city's west side.[237]
Two people were killed and three others, including a two-year-old, were injured in a drive-by shooting.[238]
Four people were injured near the Navy Yard neighborhood of southeast DC.[239]
A shooting at a playground left six people injured.[240]
A man was killed and three others were injured when shots were fired at a house party at a home north of Roper.[241]
A block party shooting left two dead and nineteen injured in the Mohican Regent neighborhood on the city's northeast side. Teenagers were among the victims.[242]
A toddler and three adults were injured in the Goodyear Heights neighborhood.[243]
Four people, including three teenagers, were shot in the Williamsburg neighborhood.[244]

2024 Florence shooting: Four people were killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a residence. The shooter fled the scene in a vehicle and was pursued by police before committing suicide and crashing his car into a ditch.[245][246]
A drive-by shooting left a man dead and three other men injured when they were fired upon while sitting in a car together.[247]
Four people were shot overnight along the city's main street.[248]
A fight during a party escalated when someone opened fire into a crowd, striking five teenage boys.[249]
A fight in a nightclub was brought out into the parking lot where multiple people retrieved guns and opened fire, killing a man and injuring three others.[250]
Four people, including a security guard, were injured after a fight between two suspects escalated into a shooting at an adult entertainment club.[251]
Six teenagers were shot during a large Independence Day party at home.[252]
A shootout between two individuals killed one person and wounded six, including a 15-year-old boy in the Austin neighborhood on the city's west side.[253]
Eight people were wounded during a shootout between two individuals in the Little Italy neighborhood in the city's west side.[253]
A man fired a round of birdshot at a neighbor's Independence Day party, injuring seven, including multiple children.[254]
A man was killed and five others were injured.[255]
Seven people, including four teenagers, were wounded in a shooting in Downtown St. Louis.[255][256]
Four people were struck by celebratory gunfire in Downtown Nashville during an Independence Day celebration.[257]

A fight at a car wash in the Far Southwest neighborhood developed into a shooting in which a man fatally shot another man as well as a baby and a toddler and injured two others. During the gunfire the shooter was also injured.[258]
A man was killed and eight others were injured in a drive-by shooting in the city's southwest side.[259]
A dispute over fireworks led to a man opening fire on a group in the Marian - Cold Springs, killing a woman, before he was fired back upon and injured.[260]
Two adults and a child were killed and two other children were wounded in the Greater Grand Crossing neighborhood on the city's south side after a personal dispute escalated.[261]

Two men opened fire outside a bar in northwest Knoxville, killing two, including a security guard, and wounding another. One of the shooters later fatally shot himself on July 11 in a Jacksonville, Florida hotel room after U.S. Marshals closed in on him.[262]
Five people were wounded during a shootout at a Chinese restaurant in the Grays Ferry neighborhood in the city's south side.[263][264]
Six people were shot in a civic center parking lot.[265]
Four people were shot, three fatally, in a shooting in Corryville near the campus of the University of Cincinnati.[266][267]
Six people were wounded during a block party when multiple shooters opened fire at a fireworks festival in the Lawton Place neighborhood near Sylvania.[268][269]
A man shot and killed three people at a home before killing himself.[270]

A man opened fire at a home across from his, wounding seven, including four children. After police made entry into the shooter's house they found him dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.[271] The victims were Guatemalan immigrants, and authorities are investigating if there was a racial motive.[272]
A fight escalated into a shooting that wounded four, including a teenage boy, shortly after midnight.[273]
Two teenagers were killed and three others were injured in a midnight shooting in the city's west side.[274]
Two men were killed and five others were injured when a group of men outside an apartment complex were fired upon.[275]
Four people were injured in a targeted shooting at a BP gas station, including two children, in the White Manor neighborhood.[276]
Five people were killed and a teenage girl was critically injured at an apartment complex. The suspect later committed suicide  after being located by officers.[277]

A man drove to a Motel 6 east of Bradenton where he fatally shot his mother. He then drove to a home in Memphis where he killed one of his cousins. Finally, he drove to a home south of West Bradenton where he killed his final victim, the friend of one of his ex-girlfriends. During the early morning of the following day the shooter was killed in a shoot-out with Hamilton County Sheriff's Office deputies at a service station off Interstate 75.[278][279]
Four teenage girls were shot during the early evening.[280]

Four people, including an 11-year-old boy, were injured in a domestic related shooting in the Greenwich Village neighborhood. The suspect was also injured and drove himself to a hospital where he later died.[281]
A woman was killed and six others were injured in a drive-by shooting in the MacFarlane neighborhood. One of the victims who was a teenager later died.[282]
Four people were shot in the Greenwood & Hamilton neighborhood during the early morning.[283]
Four people were shot during the early morning hours.[284]
An 18-year-old man was killed and four others were injured, including the man who killed him, in an early morning shooting.[285]
A shooting at a party wounded nine, including three juveniles, in the Boylston neighborhood. Four others were injured while fleeing the gunfire either in vehicular accidents or by broken glass.[286]
A fight in Downtown St. Louis erupted in gunfire, killing a man and injuring five others. A police officer was assaulted while responding to the scene.[287]

A fight at a park in Downtown Rochester escalated into a shooting that wounded six. While securing the scene a police officer was assaulted and suffered a knee injury by a man who was then arrested.[288]
Jacksonville-based rapper Julio Foolio was killed and three others were injured in an 'ambush' shooting at the Holiday Inn parking lot near the University of South Florida campus.[289][290]
Ten people were shot in the Short North Arts District near Downtown Columbus.[291]
Six adults were shot north of Glen Allen off of State Route 626 shortly before midnight.[292]
A 19-year-old man fatally shot another man and injured five others at a popular city hangout spot.[293]
Eight people were shot at a nightclub, with one man being killed, in the Russell neighborhood shortly after midnight.[294]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting during the late afternoon.[295]
Three men and a woman were shot in the Congress Heights neighborhood of southeast DC shortly before midnight.[296]

2024 Fordyce shooting: A shooting at a local grocery store left four people dead and nine others injured, including two police officers. The shooter was shot by responding police and arrested.[297][298]

During a Juneteenth celebration near Lake Merritt, an illegal sideshow began, and a fight escalated, leading to fifteen people being struck by gunfire. One woman was also arrested for assaulting a police officer.[299]
Three shooters opened fire at a crowd in the Allegheny West neighborhood on the city's north side, wounding seven, including a teenage girl. Police believe the victims were targeted.[300]
Two people were killed, including a pregnant woman, and two others were injured in a shooting in the Iron Triangle neighborhood. Two of the shooting victims are juveniles.[301]
A woman was killed and three men were wounded in a shooting shortly before midnight.[302]
A shootout between two people in the West Englewood community on the city's southwest side left seven people injured in the crossfire.[303]

A person fired into a crowd of people in the Humboldt Park community on the city's west side, wounding five, including three teenagers. A woman also suffered a broken ankle while fleeing the gunfire.[303]
A shooting at a Marathon gas station left four people injured.[304]
Seven people were shot during a gathering in a commercial area, including several teenagers, with one other sustaining a head injury while fleeing.[305]
Four people were shot, one fatally, in the parking lot of a lakeside park.[306]
Four females, including at least one teenager, and a man were shot in the Osborn area on the city's northeast side. One adult female was killed.[307]
A 19-year-old man killed his parents and injured one officer in a shootout. He was then shot and killed by officers.[308]

Two people were killed and at least fourteen people were injured in a shooting at Old Settlers Park during a Juneteenth festival, which featured performances from artists such as Sean Ardoin and Paul Wall, when two groups opened fire on each other.[309][310]
Five people were wounded in a shooting at an event being held at a park in the Madisonville neighborhood in the city's northeast side.[311]
A shooting at a party being held at a home wounded six, including several teenagers.[312]
A shooting at a gas station killed a man and injured three others, including a city fire marshal.[313]

2024 Rochester Hills shooting: A man pulled up and exited his vehicle, approached a splash pad before opening fire, wounding nine people, including two children. The suspect died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound hours later after barricading himself in a house.[314][315]
Two family members opened fire on each other at a Days Inn east of Lilly Grove. One shooter and four bystanders, including a five-year-old, were struck by gunfire.[316]
A man was killed and four others were injured in a drive-by shooting.[317]
Four people were shot, with two men being killed, at a nightclub in Downtown Columbus.[318]
A drive-by shooting in the Calumet Heights community in the city's south side left three men and a woman injured.[319]
A drive-by shooting in the West Pullman community in the city's south side left three women and a man injured.[320]
A family of four was murdered and set ablaze east of Hudson. Officers found the bodies inside the burn pit two days later and arrested the suspect the next day.[321]
A murder-suicide at a home left two adults and two children dead.[322]

Police responded to a person barricaded in a home threatening suicide. Police were then fired upon from inside the home, striking three officers, before the shooter was shot and injured and taken into custody.[323]
A man shot three people after an altercation at a mall food court in the Peachtree Center of Downtown Atlanta before being shot by a police officer.[324]

Four minors and an adult were injured in a shooting on I-240 in East Memphis. A car chase then occurred as police chased the suspects believed to be involved in the shooting, which resulted in an officer crashing in Raleigh. The suspects later crashed and were detained in Frayser.[325][326]
Three men and a teenage boy were shot in the Deep Ellum neighborhood in the city's east side overnight.[327]
Four people were shot in Downtown Richmond shortly before midnight.[328]

Six people were injured in a shooting in the Fairlawn neighborhood of Southeast DC, including three teenagers, during the late afternoon. A police officer crashed and was injured while responding to the scene.[329]

Ten people were shot after at least one person opened fire at a rooftop party at an apartment complex near the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison campus, including several teenagers. Two people suffered other injuries.[330][331]
Four people were shot at a block party during the evening hours.[332]
An argument in a business parking lot escalated when a man retrieved a firearm from his car and opened fire, striking four, in the Fourth Ward.[333]
Three adults were found dead overnight and two others injured after police responded to a disturbance call.[334][335]
A teenage girl was among four wounded in a shooting at a graduation party being held in the yard of a home east of Sheldon.[336]
One person was killed and five were injured in a shooting at a backyard birthday party in the evening.[337]
A shooting at a park left a man dead and four other men injured during the afternoon.[338]
A shooting at a home in a domestic violence incident left a man and a boy dead and two others, including another boy, injured in the Oak Park Northwest neighborhood.[339]
Two men riding a moped opened fire on a group in the Fairhill neighborhood in the city's north side, wounding four, including two teenagers.[340]
A 15-year-old boy was killed and three others, including two other teenagers, were wounded in a shooting during the late evening.[341]
Four people were wounded in a shooting in the Raleigh neighborhood in the city's north side.[342]
A large fight escalated into a shooting that wounded four shortly after midnight.[343]
Six people were shot outside a bar in the Fairgrounds neighborhood in the city's north side.[344]
Four men were shot in the Chestnut neighborhood during the early morning hours.[345]
A man and a woman were killed and seven others were injured in an exchange of gunfire inside a bar.[346]
Six minors were wounded in a shooting during a party at a business.[347]
A man was killed and at least twenty-nine others were injured in an overnight shooting at a street party.[348]
Police discovered four bodies inside a home during afternoon. It was learned that a man fatally shot his parents and his partner before turning the gun on himself.[349]
A shooting in the Cobbs Creek neighborhood in the city's west side left one man dead and three others injured.[350]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting in the Mount Vernon neighborhood on the city's east side.[351]
A man and a woman were killed and two others were injured in a shooting during a block party.[352]

Four people were wounded in a shooting at a block party in the Miller Grove neighborhood on the city's westside, including a suspect by police gunfire.[353][354] One of the victims later died of her injuries.[355]

Two people, including a police officer, were killed when at least one person opened fire on a crowd outside a home in the Gila River Indian Community during the early morning. Four others were injured, including another police officer.[356]
A shootout at a home east of Candler-McAfee injured six men.[357]
A man fatally shot his wife, daughter, and daughter-in-law and injured his son before committing suicide at a town-home. A three-month-old baby was left unharmed.[358]

2024 Minneapolis shooting: Two men were shot and killed in an apartment building in the Whittier neighborhood by a gunman. The gunman exchanged fire with police who responded to the scene, killing one officer and injuring three other people. The gunman was then killed. One injured victim later succumbed to his wounds on June 9.[359][360][361][362]
Four people were shot during the late afternoon.[363]
A 15-year-old boy and a man were killed and two others, including another teenager, were wounded in a shooting shortly before midnight in the Whitcomb neighborhood on the city's East End.[364]
Five people were shot at an apartment complex in the Meadowview neighborhood on the city's south side.[365]
A 17-year-old was killed and six other people, mostly teenagers, were injured in a late night shooting at a park in Downtown Lansing.[366]
A man was killed and three others, including a teenager, were injured in a shooting in the North Lawndale neighborhood of the city's West Side during the early morning.[367]
A man shot five people in the entertainment district of Westport on the city's south side before he was fatally shot by a public safety officer.[368]
A man was killed and three other people were injured in a late night shooting in Downtown Cleveland.[369]
A man shot five people at a home before barricading himself. During a stand-off with police the man fired shots at an LAPD helicopter before he was arrested.[370]
Four people were injured, including a teenage boy, in a shooting at a park during the evening hours.[371]
Five people, including three teenagers, were wounded in a shooting shortly after midnight.[372]
Three people were injured and two were killed in a shooting during a party at a banquet hall shortly before midnight.[373]
A man armed with a handgun shot five people at a linen business, killing two. The suspect was allegedly a disgruntled employee.[374]
Three people were found shot at an intersection in the Allison Hill neighborhood. A fourth person was also found shot on the next street over.[375]
Four men who were walking were shot when someone in a car pulled up and opened fire in the North Lawndale neighborhood on the city's west side.[376]
A verbal argument escalated when a man pulled out a gun and fired multiple shots, killing another man and wounding four other people in the Bagley neighborhood in the city's northwest side.[377]

A man fatally shot a woman and a juvenile and injured two other juveniles at a home in Stoney Creek Township. Alamance County deputies spotted the shooter in a car in Burlington and after commanding him to surrender he fatally shot himself.[378]
A shooting in the Midtown neighborhood killed a man and injured three others.[379]

Police responded to calls of around 100 vehicles being driven recklessly on Missouri Route 141 and a connecting road. Once police arrived they were fired upon from multiple vehicles and five people were struck by gunfire, none of them being officers.[380]
Shortly before midnight, a dispute between two women led to a shooting that left eleven people injured in Ellis Square.[381]
Three people opened fire on a group of men in the East Garfield Park neighborhood on the city's west side, wounding six.[382]
A man shot three, mortally wounding two, before being killed by police.[383]
A shooting during the early morning at a shopping plaza just outside of Sarasota killed one and injured four.[384]
An early morning shooting between the Weinland Park and Italian Village neighborhoods resulted in three people killed and three others wounded.[385]

A man fatally shot his mother and his two adult sisters at a home before fleeing the state. Arizona Highway Patrol officers located him on U.S. 191 a day after the murders between Morenci and Clifton where he was fatally shot after brandishing a firearm at police.[386][387]
A 15-year-old boy was killed and three others were injured in a shooting during the evening hours.[388]
Two men were killed and two others were injured in a shooting at a shopping center during the early morning hours.[389]

Shortly after midnight a partygoer flagged down police officers and told them that someone at a house party was brandishing a firearm. When police arrived they heard gunshots and found four people had been shot. A 16-year-old boy was killed.[390]
Two people were killed and four were injured after a fight at a nightclub escalated into a shooting in the Colonial Homes neighborhood.[391]

Officers responded to a report of an armed man in the Capitol View neighborhood. When they arrived, they found a man armed with a handgun, and when one of them attempted to restrain him, he opened fire and struck three of them. They then returned fire, killing him.[392]
Three people were killed and fifteen were injured in a shooting at a May Day event being held in a field north of Stockton.[393]
Two men were killed and two others were injured in a shooting at a bar in the Southland Park neighborhood.[394]
A man shot three men and a woman at an apartment complex, killing one of the men.[395]
Two people opened fire at a home in a targeted attack just outside of San Antonio, striking five, including three children. A four-year-old was killed.[396]
A man killed three children he was babysitting at a park before he killed himself just north of Tucker.[397]
A large fight escalated into a shooting that wounded four in the Pettit-Rudisill neighborhood.[398]
A man shot four people, including a child, at a shopping mall during the early morning hours. Two men were killed.[399]
A shooting at a bar wounded five during the late evening hours.[400]
A shooting outside a gas station in the Bush Hills neighborhood left one dead and six injured.[401]
An altercation at a home just outside of Tuscaloosa escalated into a shooting, leaving one dead and three injured.[402]

A man got into an argument at a family gathering at a home. The man then returned to the gathering armed with two of his brothers, striking five, including a five-year-old and a teenager, as well as both of his brothers.[403]
A shooting at a house party in the Cold Springs neighborhood killed a 14-year-old girl and wounded five other teenagers.[404]
Two people opened fire on a group outside a nightclub in the Davenport Park neighborhood, injuring seven, in what is believed to be a gang-related incident.[405]
A shooting at an event center where a baby shower was being held in the Richmond Hill area of Queens killed a man and injured three other men.[406]
Four people were shot, one fatally, near a shopping center in the Hickory Hill neighborhood.[407]
An 18-year-old was killed and three others, including two other teenagers, were injured in a shooting at a home in the Kingsessing neighborhood.[408]

A woman fatally shot her husband outside their home in Pulaski County before driving southwest to the home of her sister in Russell County where she fatally shot her sister. She then drove northeast to the home of her brother where she forced herself inside, injuring him before he mortally wounded her in self-defense.[409]
Six people were shot at a birthday party, five of whom were minors.[410]
A shooting at an apartment complex during a cook-out killed a man and injured three other men just north of Richmond.[411]
An altercation between two women at a park near Frank Cody High School on the city's west side lead to a man opening fire, hitting two women and two children. One of the women shot is pregnant.[412]
A drive-by shooting outside an apartment complex wounded six, the youngest of whom was three years old and the oldest of whom was 19 years old.[413]

2024 Charlotte shootout: Four police officers were killed and four others were injured in a shootout during a U.S. Marshals task force search for a wanted fugitive in the Shannon Park neighborhood. The subject of the warrant was also killed.[414][415]

A fight amongst a group of students at Miami Norland Senior High School was brought off-campus to be discussed among a group of adults and teenagers. During the discussion, another fight occurred and an adult pulled out a gun and opened fire, striking two teenagers and three adults.[416]
An argument among a group at a club just northeast of Utica escalated into a shooting that killed a man and injured four others.[417]

A man wanted for an armed robbery and shooting the previous week shot two more men whom he mistook for undercover police officers, which led to a standoff in which he shot three police officers before being killed by a police sniper.[418]

Ten people were shot when a 16-year-old boy opened fire early Sunday during a verbal altercation at Cabana Live, a restaurant and event venue near Sanford. The suspect was apprehended and booked into the juvenile detention center.[419][420]

Two people were killed and four were injured in a late-night shootout involving police officers at Market Square during the Festival San Antonio. An 18-year-old man shot and killed another man before being fatally shot by police. Four bystanders were injured.[421][422]
A shooting during a party at a home killed a young woman and injured three others.[423]
A 15-year-old opened fire at an after-prom party and killed another 15-year-old and wounded three other teenagers.[424]
A 16-year-old opened fire shortly after midnight at the end of an after-prom party for Lake Marion High School students and killed a 19-year-old and wounded three others.[425]
Five people were injured when two people opened fire upon each other at a barber shop in the Pleasant Valley neighborhood.[426]
Four people were injured after a street fight turned into a shooting in the Seabreeze neighborhood.[427]
A man who was kicked out of a bar pulled out a gun and shot six people, including a security guard, in the Dupont Circle neighborhood of in Northwest DC.[428]
A man shot and killed a woman and wounded two other people in a car before killing himself.[429]
Five people, including two teenagers, were injured in a drive-by shooting outside an apartment complex southwest of Petersburg.[430]
A man killed his wife and three of their children before killing himself in their home near Yukon. A fourth child was found unharmed.[431]

Two teenage girls and a 12-year-old girl were shot in a neighborhood. Authorities then tracked down and stopped a car believed to be involved in the shooting. Inside they found two people, one with a mortal gunshot wound to the head and a person of interest who was arrested.[432]
At least two shooters opened fire and killed two people, while wounding seven others at a large block party being held at a park in the Orange Mound neighborhood.[433]
A man fatally shot two women and injured another at a home before committing suicide.[434]
A drive-by shooting outside a convenience store in the Trinidad neighborhood of Northeast DC wounded four, including a teenager.[435]
Around 500 juvenile and young adult students gathered at a park for "senior skip day" for a water gun fight. During the fight, someone opened fire with an actual gun, striking five teenagers.[436]
A fight among a group of people escalated into a shooting that wounded four during the evening hours.[437]
One person was killed and three were injured by two shooters riding scooters in the Mount Eden neighborhood of The Bronx.[438]
A man was killed and three others were injured south of Clinton.[439]
A drive-by shooting outside a county health department office wounded four, including three juveniles.[440]
A shooting at a nightclub in the Lower Garden District killed a woman and injured eleven others.[441]
A teenager was killed and three others were injured in a shooting outside a home in the Montrose Heights neighborhood.[442]
A shooting believed to have stemmed from gang violence killed a woman and injured eight others after a large party went out onto the street in South Dallas.[443]
An argument between the two individuals escalated into a shooting that left six people injured near a nightclub in South Nashville.[444]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a home during the morning hours.[445]
A fight at a nightclub between gang members escalated when a man fired shots into a crowd, striking four, during the early morning hours.[446]

A child was killed and ten others, including three other children, were injured when three shooters walked up to a street and opened fire at a remote crowd during a family gathering in the Back of the Yards neighborhood on the South Side.[447]
A man was killed and nine others were injured in a shooting erupted at a block party during the evening hours.[448]

Two suspects engaged in a shootout with Memphis Police Department officers, leaving a suspect and a police officer dead and the other suspect and two others wounded. The dead officer was killed by friendly fire from other officers.[449][450]
Four men were shot, one fatally, near an apartment complex during the evening hours in a targeted attack.[451]
One man was killed and five others injured, including two children, in Northeast DC.[452]

Three women were injured after a verbal altercation between two groups of teenagers escalated into a shooting near Armature Works in Tampa Heights. A teenager who was involved in the shooting was also injured and later arrested.[453]
Four bystanders to a fight in an event center parking lot in the Grand Portland neighborhood were shot, with one woman being killed.[454]
Three men and a woman were shot in the Bellevue neighborhood of Southwest DC during the evening hours.[455]
Six people, including three teenagers, were struck by gunfire in an event center parking lot in Uptown when they were fired upon from across the street.[456]

A man was found in a car suffering a gunshot wound following reports of shots fired. Shortly afterwards, police engaged in a chase with a car believed to be involved with the previous shooting and after the vehicle was stopped, three teenagers were found inside injured. A teenage boy later died from his injuries.[457]

During a fight at a nightclub in the CityPlace Doral mall, a man pulled out a gun and shot a security guard who attempted to intervene, killing him. The man and the security team got into a shootout, ending with the gunman killed and seven people, including a police officer, wounded.[458]
A man fatally shot a woman in a car and injured three others in a domestic violence incident. The shooter was located by a police dog in an abandoned house and arrested.[459]
Three adults and a juvenile were shot at an intersection during the evening hours.[460]
A shooting at an apartment complex in the McKinley School/Columbus Park neighborhood shortly before midnight killed one and injured three.[461]
A victim's car was rammed into and at least one occupant in the ramming vehicle then opened fire, wounding four, including a pregnant woman.[462]

An argument between a son and father turned into a shooting in which the son killed the father and one of his brothers and wounded his mother before taking his own life in the Duclay neighborhood of Westside.[463]
A fight between two men at a block party being held at a government housing complex turned into a shooting that injured four during the early morning hours.[464]
An argument in a bar in the United Central neighborhood escalated into a shooting that injured four, including a 17-year-old girl.[465]

A young adult woman opened fire at a birthday party at a park in Belhaven due to a fight and injured four, including an eight-year-old and a teenager. The shooter accidentally shot herself as well.[466]
An altercation among a group of young men at a gas station escalated into a shooting that killed one and injured three during the early morning hours.[467]

A man opened fire on an Alabama family for "invading" his "personal space" at a restaurant in the Salemtown neighborhood. The shooter killed another man and injured five others before fleeing, and he was later arrested two days later in Princeton, Kentucky.[468][469]
Two people were killed and five others were injured in a suspected gang shooting. Three men were later arrested in connection to the shooting.[470][471]
A 16-year-old boy was fatally shot in the head and three men were injured when two people got out of a car and opened fire on them in the Austin neighborhood on the city's west side.[472][473]
Seven young people between the ages of 12 and 17-years-old were shot outside the Circle Centre Mall in Downtown Indianapolis.[474]
Four people were shot, two fatally, in the East End neighborhood.[475]

A man shot and wounded a police officer during a traffic stop, then invaded a home and shot at officers, wounding two. The suspect and officers exchanged gunfire, during which time the suspect was killed.[476]
A man was killed and four others were injured when a group drove a car into the backyard of a home and opened fire in the Rickarby neighborhood.[477]
Five people were shot in a dispute over a parking space at a blues club in the Barton-McFarland neighborhood on the city's west side.[478]
A dispute between two families escalated when a person opened fire with a rifle in the Fifth Ward, killing a woman and injuring three others.[479]
A 16-year-old was killed and three others were injured in a shooting near a convenience store during the late afternoon.[480]

Three men and two women were injured when a shooting occurred in a bar parking lot near east Washington Street just after midnight. Two police officers exchanged gunfire with a suspect and mortally wounded the man.[481]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting during the late afternoon in a neighborhood.[482]
Two men were killed and two others were injured when they were fired upon from a pickup truck near an intersection in the Seventh Ward as they sat outside on lawn chairs.[483]
A man fatally shot two women, including his wife, and injured a toddler at a home. The man later fatally shot himself on the bank of the Ohio River near McClelland Park.[484]
Two people were killed and five others were injured in an early morning shooting in the Shaw neighborhood of Northwest DC.[485]
Shortly before midnight, a bar fight erupted and then spilled out into the parking lot where a shooting occurred, leaving four injured.[486]
Four men were shot, one fatally, in southern Montgomery shortly before midnight.[487]
A shooting during the early morning hours at a bar in the Vista Del Sol West area of East El Paso killed a man and injured three others.[488]
Four people were shot, including one who was also hit by a car, and one other person was injured when a shooting erupted at a gathering at a business during the early morning hours.[489]
A person was killed and five others were injured in a shooting at a bar in the Broad Ripple neighborhood not too long after midnight.[490]

A street fight among a group of children in South Memphis escalated when a man shot an armed woman, killing her, and injured three children. The slain woman's daughter then grabbed her mother's gun and shot the man who killed her.[491]
A 43-year-old man was fatally shot by police after he shot and killed three women and a dog at an apartment.[492]
A 46-year-old man fatally shot his girlfriend and her two adult daughters and injured her granddaughter in a domestic violence incident at a home south of Lawtey.[493]
A 25-year-old man who formerly resided at an apartment in Antioch showed up armed at it and opened fire, wounding two women and a young boy on the boy's birthday before fatally shooting himself.[494]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a bar and grill.[495]
Multiple shooters are believed to have shot four men outside a closed CVS Pharmacy in the Sunset Acres neighborhood. The following day, a 22-year-old man died from his injuries at a hospital.[496]
A man fatally shot two and injured five others in a domestic incident at a house party before committing suicide.[497][498]
A man shot and killed his wife and two children. He killed himself after setting his house on fire.[499]
A suspect was arrested and charged with attempted murder after wounding four people, including a one-year-old boy.[500]
Eight Northeast High School students were shot while waiting at a bus stop when three people in a car pulled up and opened fire on them in the city's northeast side.[501]
A student from Imhotep Institute Charter High School was killed and four others were injured at a SEPTA bus stop in the Ogontz neighborhood when two people opened fire on them.[502]
Four deputies were shot while chasing a man in a car near Santa Rosa. The suspect then crashed and died.[503]
At least three people opened fire at a nightclub north of West Point shortly after midnight, killing a woman and injuring twelve others.[504]
Four adults were killed and seven others were injured in a suspected gang shooting at a house party.[505]
Two strangers opened fire at a birthday party at a sports bar, injuring each other as well as three others, including a teenager.[506]

Two people were killed and four others were injured after a fight escalated into a shooting at an apartment complex frequented by University of North Carolina at Pembroke students. A teenage student was among the dead.[507]
Four people were injured outside a Washington Corridor club after a fight between patrons and security guards escalated.[508]
A group of four were fired upon as they drove away from an apartment complex, killing a teenager and wounding three others, and causing them to crash.[509]
A teenage boy opened fire on three other teenage boys at an apartment complex, killing one and injuring the others. He injured himself in the process.[510]

A police officer and civil process server were killed and two other police officers were injured when a man opened fire during an attempted eviction at a residence. The man was injured in an exchange of gunfire and arrested.[511]
A man fatally shot his wife and their two children before committing suicide at an apartment. Their bodies were not found for about two weeks.[512]
One person was killed and six were injured in the Rosemont neighborhood after an argument over a vehicle escalated.[513]
Multiple shooters opened fire in the Ventura Village neighborhood, killing a man and injuring three others.[514]
Four men were shot, one fatally, at an apartment complex in the Fern Creek neighborhood shortly before midnight.[515]
A dispute led to one person killed, and four others, including the suspect wounded in the Greater Grand Crossing neighborhood in the city's south side.[516]
A 16-year-old boy was taken into custody after killing two people and seriously injuring two others at a home.[517]
An argument in a parking lot during the early morning led to a shooting that killed one and injured three others in the South Indian Mound neighborhood.[518]

After a domestic violence incident turned into a fight, multiple people pulled out firearms and began firing at each other. A 28-year-old man and 21-year-old woman were killed and two others were injured. The shooting occurred in the Sherman Park neighborhood on the city's northwest side. On February 29, a 39-year-old man succumbed from his injuries at a hospital.[519][520][521]
Two unidentified gunmen fatally shot three males and injured a teenage boy inside a residence in the West Chatham district in the Chatham neighborhood on the city's south side.[522]

A teenager was fatally shot and three others, including another teenager, were injured when two people opened fire upon them in Pottawattomie Park in the Rogers Park neighborhood in the city's north side.[523]
Six people were injured, two critically, when a fight broke out at a bonfire. One 25-year-old man is facing two counts of attempted murder [524] while another man has been arrested.[525][526]
A man was killed and three others were injured near a bar after a dispute in the Marshall-Shadeland neighborhood on the city's North Side.[527]
A man fired into a crowd outside a home in the West Park neighborhood, striking four.[528]
One person was killed and five were injured when an altercation escalated at a Waffle House in the city's southwest side.[529]
A woman fatally shot her two children and injured their father before fatally shooting herself at an apartment complex in the Maywood neighborhood.[530]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a warehouse party.[531]
A man was killed and another man and two women were injured in a shooting at a home. A suspect has been charged with one count of murder.[532]
Four people were injured when a man opened fire outside a bar on Adam Clayton Powell Jr. Boulevard in Harlem.[533]

2024 Burnsville shooting: Police and medics were fired upon from a home while responding to a domestic incident. Two officers and a firefighter were killed while another officer suffered a gunshot wound.[534] After opening fire on first responders, the shooter fatally shot himself.[535]
Four people were fatally shot at a car wash in the College Hills neighborhood.[536]
One man was killed and four others were injured in a shooting in the parking lot of an environmental center.[537]
Four people were injured at Benjamin Elijah Mays High School in a drive-by shooting.[538]

2024 Kansas City parade shooting: A DJ for KKFI was killed and twenty-one others, including at least nine children, were injured in a shooting outside of Kansas City Union Station at the end of the Super Bowl LVIII victory parade for the Kansas City Chiefs. The shooting stemmed from an argument among four males, with one man opening fire on three of the others, prompting a shootout in which one of the other men fired the fatal bullet. At least two of the shooters were injured.[539]
Two people were killed and two others were injured in a morning motel shooting outside of Claxton.[540]
Four people were shot in the Johnstone Square neighborhood.[541]
Five people were killed and four others were critically injured in a shooting at a streetside bar.[542]
One person was killed and five others injured after a fight turned into a shooting at the Mount Eden Avenue station in the Highbridge neighborhood of The Bronx.[543]
Three males went on an apparent random shooting spree in Los Angeles County, killing four, including a teenager, and wounding another teenager.[544]
A man shot four people inside a bar before being fatally shot by a responding police officer.[545]
An argument in the Little Village neighborhood in the city's west side led to a man shooting a woman and firing into a crowd, striking six others.[546]
One man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting in the Trinidad neighborhood of Northeast DC.[547]
Five people, including two juveniles, were shot in an apartment complex parking lot in southern Dallas.[548]
2024 East Lansdowne shooting: A man killed his niece and shot two police officers before setting his house on fire, killing himself and four other relatives who were trapped inside.[549]
Two people were killed and four others were injured in an early morning shooting in the Green Valley Ranch neighborhood.[550]
Five people were shot at multiple locations over a narcotics dispute.[551]
A shooting in the Russell neighborhood left one man dead and three others injured.[552]
At least one person fired into a window of an apartment, injuring four inside.[553]
A man shot and injured his partner and killed two others before killing himself at an apartment complex southwest of Snellville.[554]
Two people were killed and two were injured in a shooting at a home in northeast Memphis.[555]
Four people were injured in a shooting during a street takeover in the late evening.[556]
Four people were injured in a shooting near an intersection in southeast Harrisburg.[557]
A man killed three people before injuring two police officers in a shootout. He was killed after getting in a chase with additional police officers.[558][559]
A spree of connected shootings during the early morning in which at least one person shot into four different residences killed one and injured three, including a child.[560]
A man opened fire at a home in the Granada Hills neighborhood, killing his wife, son, and daughter before fatally shooting himself.[561]
A woman was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at an intersection.[562]
A fight in the parking lot of an apartment complex in the Montclaire South neighborhood escalated into a shooting that killed three and injured one other.[563]
Four people were injured, including a teenager who was put in critical condition, in a shooting in the Santa Fe neighborhood of the East Side.[564]
A man shot and killed his ex-girlfriend, her brother, and her mother before killing himself at a relative's house.[565]
A shooting during the early morning left a man dead and three others injured, including two juveniles, in the Algiers neighborhood.[566]
Six people were found shot to death in a dispute over illegal marijuana in a remote part of the Mojave Desert off U.S. Route 395 northwest of Adelanto. Five people have been arrested.[567][568]

2024 Joliet shootings: A man opened fire at four different locations in the Joliet area of Will County, including at two homes. A total of eight people, mostly family members of the shooter, were killed and one person was injured. The suspect fatally shot himself in a confrontation with law enforcement officials near Natalia, Texas a day later.[569]
Three people were killed and two were injured in a short-term rental property northeast of Katy.[570]
A man killed his wife and three adult daughters in his home.[571]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a restaurant in the Wakefield neighborhood of the Bronx.[572]
Four people were injured in a parking lot shooting. One of the victims later died from their injuries.[573]
A man killed three people and wounded two others, including a teenager, at an apartment complex. He was later arrested in Melbourne.[574]
A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a bar during the early morning hours.[575]
A shooting at a gathering near Buhl left a man dead and three others injured.[576]
An argument at a business in the Woodmere neighborhood led to a shooting that killed three and injured one.[577]
One person was killed and four others were injured during a shooting in the Tenderloin District.[578]
Two people were killed and two others were injured in a shooting after an altercation between multiple individuals escalated in Downtown Las Vegas.[579]
A man shot and injured six people at the Crown Center mall after an argument.[580]
A woman fatally shot her husband and two daughters before committing suicide.[581]
Five people, including a 16-year-old boy, were killed in a drive-by shooting motivated by drug trafficking.[582]
Multiple shooters opened fire at two different locations a block apart, including at a hospital where a teenager was killed. In total, two were killed and three were injured.[583]
Four teenagers were injured during a shooting at a party at a warehouse southeast of Aldine.[584]
Two people were killed and four others were injured in the Strawberry Mansion neighborhood of North Philadelphia.[585]
A man killed his estranged wife and three other family members, including his eight-year-old niece, at a home southwest of Four Corners before committing suicide.[586]
A man injured five people at an intersection in a drive-by shooting that is thought to be gang-related.[587]
Two people were killed and three others were injured after an argument led to a shooting.[588]
Four people were shot and two to three other people were hurt while fleeing a shootout during a party near Abbeville.[589]
A teenager fatally shot four of his neighbors at their home and robbed the house of its firearms before attempting to hide two of the victim's bodies with the help of his mother.[590]
Multiple shooters opened fire outside of an apartment complex from a car, killing one person and injuring five others.[591]

Perry High School shooting: One student was killed and four other students and three staff members were injured at Perry High School. The shooter, a 17-year-old student at the school, committed suicide.[592] One of the people who was shot died from his injuries on January 14.[593]
A man fatally shot his girlfriend and her cousin and injured his infant son before killing himself.[594]
A man fatally shot a teenager and another man and injured two other men.[595]

A man wanted for shooting a man and stabbing another on December 16, 2023 in the Kalihi neighborhood of Honolulu shot a woman on the interstate in Halawa on New Years and stole her car. Officers attempted to apprehend the man in Kalihi, but he opened fire and successfully escaped. He then stole another woman's car at gunpoint after crashing near Kaneohe and drove back to Honolulu. The man then shot two police officers before being killed in the Manoa neighborhood.[596]
A man fatally shot three of his family members at a house before turning the gun on himself.[597]
A teenager was killed and four other people were injured in a drive-by shooting spanning a six-block radius.[598]
Four people were shot at an event center. While investigators initially said a security guard shot them, it was later stated that he did not shoot any of the victims.[599]
Two people were killed and eight others were injured when a fight occurred at a New Year's party in Downtown Los Angeles.[600]
